price: 4. Yalli seehadaytu tiffoytak {daacoyta kinnuk} gine, tokkel usuk Yalli rabeh yan mara mugsa iyyaamal baxxaqqa iyya kaxxa giddi-li kinni.
arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٖ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: khalaqa al-insāna min nuṭ'fatin fa-idhā huwa khaṣīmun mubīnun
